className.transform: const sizes = { sm: 'h-1', md: 'h-2', lg: 'h-3' }; const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('relative w-full bg-secondary rounded-full overflow-hidden', sizes[data || 'md'], props.className)

const variants = { default: 'bg-primary', accent: 'bg-accent', destructive: 'bg-destructive' }; const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('h-full transition-all duration-300 ease-out', variants[data || 'default'])

style.transform: const { value, max = 100 } = props; const percentage = Math.min(Math.max((value / max) * 100, 0), 100); return { width: `${percentage}%` }

children.transform: const { value, max = 100 } = props; const percentage = Math.min(Math.max((value / max) * 100, 0), 100); return `${Math.round(percentage)}%`
